query:
INSERT INTO micro_retreats (title, description, durationMinutes, steps) VALUES
('Forgiveness Practice', 'Release the burden of resentment through guided forgiveness meditation. This retreat helps you forgive yourself, forgive others, and ask for forgiveness.', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Sit comfortably and take 5 deep breaths. Feel your body supported by the earth.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Reflection', 'instruction', 'Bring to mind someone you need to forgive. Notice any resistance or pain.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Release', 'instruction', 'Silently say: "I forgive you. I forgive myself. I release this burden."'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Notice how your body feels. Carry this lightness forward.')
)),
('Befriending Your Inner Critic', 'Transform your relationship with self-judgment through compassionate inquiry. This retreat helps you understand the protective function of your inner critic.', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Settle into a comfortable position. Breathe naturally for 1 minute.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Exploration', 'instruction', 'Notice your inner critic. What does it say? What is it trying to protect you from?'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Compassion', 'instruction', 'Thank your inner critic for trying to help. Imagine befriending it.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Feel the shift from judgment to compassion. Breathe this in.')
)),
('Solitude & Silence', 'Explore the richness of being alone without distraction. This retreat guides you into intentional solitude, helping you distinguish between loneliness and aloneness.', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Turn off all devices. Sit in silence for 1 minute.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Exploration', 'instruction', 'Notice what arises in the silence. Observe without judgment.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Deepening', 'instruction', 'Lean into the silence. Feel the presence of your own being.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Carry this peaceful solitude into your day.')
)),
('Loving-Kindness Meditation', 'Cultivate compassion for yourself and others through traditional metta practice. This retreat guides you through extending loving-kindness to all beings.', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Sit comfortably. Place your hand on your heart. Breathe gently.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Self-Compassion', 'instruction', 'Silently repeat: "May I be happy. May I be healthy. May I be safe. May I be at ease."'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Expanding', 'instruction', 'Extend these wishes to loved ones, neutral people, difficult people, and all beings.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Feel the warmth of loving-kindness throughout your being.')
)),
('Impermanence Contemplation', 'Reflect deeply on the transient nature of all things. This retreat uses guided contemplation to help you make peace with change, loss, and the flowing...', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Settle into stillness. Notice your breath flowing in and out.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Observation', 'instruction', 'Observe how everything around you is changing - sounds, sensations, thoughts.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Acceptance', 'instruction', 'Recognize that change is the nature of existence. Relax into this truth.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Feel the peace that comes from accepting impermanence.')
)),
('Gratitude as Rebellion', 'In a world optimized for dissatisfaction, gratitude is a radical act. This retreat helps you reclaim it.', 15, JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 1, 'title', 'Grounding', 'instruction', 'Sit comfortably. Take 3 deep breaths.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 2, 'title', 'Reflection', 'instruction', 'Bring to mind 3 things you are grateful for - big or small.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 3, 'title', 'Deepening', 'instruction', 'For each, feel the gratitude in your body. Let it expand.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('stepNumber', 4, 'title', 'Integration', 'instruction', 'Carry this gratitude forward as an act of resistance and joy.')
));
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.9bb51d851611 --database my7vf9kVVC5tHsnhvudijY --execute INSERT INTO micro_retreats (title, description, durationMinutes, steps) VALUES
